Trade/Device Name(s): VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin A1c Program
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin A1c Program, a system for measuring hemoglobin A1c in whole blood using ion-exchange HPLC integrated with automated sample transport and data management.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for percent determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood using ion-exchange HPLC, for professional use with the VARIANT II TURBO Link Hemoglobin Testing System interfaced with automated sample transport.
